channel.title: intro on Vincent Demeester

item.title: Reinit and Jekyll
item.description: Two weeks ago, my online personal server has been attacked and, somehow, died. I’m in the process of re-installation of it but I’m going to hardened a bit the security on it. Anyway, this crash meant that every piece of site I maintain has been down. That’s why I moved this identity site on the github pages, using a CNAME ; That way I can crash as much as I want my server(s), this page should still be up for a while.
